verses.sanskrit: मेघैर्मेदुरमम्बरं वनभुवः श्यामास्तमालद्रुमै- र्नक्तं भीरुरयं त्वमेव तदिमं राधे गृहं प्रापय । इत्थं नन्दनिदेशतश्चलितयोः प्रत्यध्वकुञ्जद्रुमं राधामाधवयोर्जयन्ति यमुनाकूले रहः केलयः ॥१॥
verses.translation: The sky is covered with clouds, the woodlands are dark with Tamala trees. He is afraid of the night. Therefore, O Radha, take him home. Thus, by Nanda's command, the secret sports of Radha and Madhava triumph on the banks of the Yamuna as they proceed from bower to bower.
